name: Geometric Pastel Triangle Tumblr Dashboard
description: This is a minimalist tumblr dashboard with a repeating geometric background that will work on any screen size, a white content box that disappears as you scroll, two tumblr logo options, and a splatter paint triangle home button. If you need something adjusted, customized, or have any other questions or concerns, feel free to contact me @eatyourheirs for prompt assistance and coding customized to fix your problem.
additional_info:
If you want to install a post icons userstyle to replace the default pink ones shown in the theme, simply disable & reenable the icons after installing this theme to override them.

11/13 - Code tweaks and realignment.
1/20 - Code updates and formatting management.

style_setting_options.label: Pink Pastel Geometric
style_setting_options.value:
#dashboard_index,
#dashboard_edit_post,
#dashboard_submissions,
#dashboard_drafts,
#dashboard_post_queue,
#dashboard_followers,
#dashboard_members,
#dashboard_messages_inbox,
#tagged_actions_display,
#settings_actions_tumblelog,
#dashboard_useraction_followers,
#activity_actions_index,
#search_actions_search,
#dashboard_posts_likes,
#dashboard_group_members,
#dashboard_useraction_following,
.identity {
	background: url('http://i.imgur.com/9fwmvFq.png') top left #A1E8DE repeat fixed !important;
    }
